metadata.title: CVE-2021-38597 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: wolfSSL before 4.8.1 incorrectly skips OCSP verification in certainsituations of irrelevant response data that contains the NoCheck extension.

criterions.comment: wolfssl: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
